subject: Availability of Black Plus X in Germany Warehouse – Mid-August Order
description_text:
Hi Simsonn Team,

I’m planning to order the black Plus X pedal set around August 12th and wanted to confirm availability.
Could you please let me know if the Germany warehouse will have the black version in stock at that time?

My goal is to ensure that the order ships from within the EU so that no VAT or customs charges apply in Austria.

Thank you for confirming — I’m ready to place my order as soon as I have this information.

Best regards,
Diart Tahiri

conversations.body_text: Hi Diart Tahiri,    A new shipment will be arriving at the German warehouse soon, so there will definitely be stock available if you place your order on the 12th. Of course, you can add a note to your order to be on the safe side.
